Assistant Professor (Maîtresse de Conférences) in Statistics at **AgroParisTech** since september 2023.\
*MMIP dept (Modélisation Mathématique, Informatique et Physique), UFR de Mathématique*\
Research at **UMR MIA Paris-Saclay** (Mathématique et Informatique Appliquées).

Formerly PhD at Centre of Geosciences and Geoengineering, Mines Paris (2020-2023).

::: callout-note
## Save the date and subscribe to the PIML Day on April 15, 2026

We are organizing a day of symposium on physic-informed machine-learning together with Hugo Gangloff, Nicolas Jouvin and Mathilde Mougeot. We planned a nice program & list of speakers covering a wide range or area from statistical learning to modeling and numerical analysis! The event will also have a poster session.

It will take place in the beautiful AgroParisTech campus, in the heart of our beloved Plateau de Saclay.

Registration is free but mandatory. All the info are on the conference website

<https://pimlday26.sciencesconf.org/>
:::

::: callout-tip
## New PhD student

In October 2025 I welcomed in my team Alexandre Loret, a PhD student under the supervision of Thomas Romary, Nicolas Desassis (Mines Paris) and myself. His PhD is funded by the [Geolearning](https://chaire-geolearning.org/) chair.

He will tackle the computational challenges of the inference of complex spatio-temporal models, exploring different techniques in Deep Learning.

Let this new adventure begin!
:::

::: callout-tip
## M2 internships 2026

In spring 2026 I will supervision two M2 internships in MIA Paris-Saclay:

-   [Inference of spatio-temporal stochastic recurrence models for extreme oceanographic data](assets/M2internship_ST_sre_2026.pdf) with Gloria Buritica, funded by the [DataIA Institute](https://www.dataia.eu/)

-   [Physics Informed Neural Networks for parameter estimation in Stochastic Differential Equations](assets/M2internship_PINNS_SDE_2026.pdf) with Hugo Gangloff, Nicolas Jouvin and Sophie Donnet
:::

# Research

An incomplete list of research topics I'm interested in:

-   Spatio-temporal statistics
-   Stochastic Partial Differential Equations
-   Deep generative models
-   Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)

# Teaching

I teach statistics (Linear and non-linear models, Machine Learning, Spatial Statistics, Bayesian Statistics...) at undergraduate and graduate students at *AgroParisTech*, Master [*BEE of University Paris Saclay*](), *Mines Paris* and Master [*BEE of AgroParisTech and University of Guyana*](https://umr-ecofog.cirad.fr/enseignement/master-2-bee/presentation).
